thumb.title: yancović - Via Satellite of Love(ft.Mai&GUMI fm Synthesizer V)
thumb.description: ＜Via Satellite of Love>It's rarely chance to get to contact with youI've been waiting for a long timeStrawberry or jerry fish pattern clothin'What's your favorite?Tell me and love meI wonder if it's okay to act like I don't careBut my love for you may overflow and notice meAre you ok?What you gonna be my baby?Always we can stay in touch via satelliteBut I can't feel your body heat through a screenIt's like a fairy tale has come to lifeCan you smell lovely perfume?Are you not hooked yet?I'm fallin' love you so.Fallin' love with you It's rarely chance to get to contact with youI've been waiting for a long timeFloral or citrus perfume which can tempt you?I wanna dream of just the two of usThe two steps will eventually become one and echo in the moonlit nightthe sky where satellites floatI just gonna do what you wanna doI want you to tell me in the songI just gonna do what you wanna doI wonder if that star knowsAre you getting it across?In my heartIt's full of singing voices#SynthesizerV#ボカロ#VOCALOID#Mai#GUMI
